snippet.title: Castlevania Lords of Shadow 2 Trailer (E3 2013)
snippet.description:
Break the curse of immortality ! Join us on Facebook : http://www.facebook.com/GameNewsOfficial and subscribe now : http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=GameNewsOfficial. Our brightest hope or our darkest nightmare ?

Castlevania Lords of Shadow 2 Trailer (E3 2013). Release date : Winter 2013 for PS3, Xbox 360 and PC (Steam). Subscribe now to get the latest game trailer, gameplay teaser & cinematic video, videogame walkthrough and ingame videos with Game News Official (GameNews) !
